comments: Replay review of the foul called on Haliburton (IND) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Haliburton cleanly deflects the ball away from Brunson (NYK), and the ensuing arm contact is incidental.  At the time of the whistle, the Pacers had imminent possession and play correctly resumes with Indiana ball.
Hartenstein (NYK) briefly grasps and releases Turner's (IND) arm.
DiVincenzo (NYK) makes clean contact with the ball as he defends Nembhard's (IND) drive.
DiVincenzo (NYK) maintains a legal guarding position on Nembhard's (IND) driving shot attempt.
Nembhard (IND) and DiVincenzo (NYK) engage and disengage on the pick.
Turner (IND) fails to fully clear and is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Nembhard (IND) firms up in Brunson's (NYK) path on his drive and maintains a legal guarding position.
Turner (IND) establishes a legal position on Hart's (NYK) side before the contact.
After establishing a legal screening position in Nesmith's (IND) path, DiVincenzo (NYK) clamps his arm and prevents him from disengaging.
Nesmith (IND) makes contact to the ball with his hand, not his foot. There is no replay trigger to review a kicked ball call.
Nembhard (IND) maintains a legal guarding position while defending Brunson (NYK).
DiVincenzo (NYK) is moving sideways along Siakam's (IND) path in a legal guarding position when Siakam steps on his foot.
Anunoby (NYK) maintains a legal guarding position, moving along Siakam's (IND) path on his drive.
Nembhard (IND) is in a legal position when Brunson (NYK) moves his arms from side-to-side with the ball, making contact with Nembhard's arm as he starts of his dribble.
Nembhard (IND) briefly grasps Brunson's (NYK) jersey during the inbound.

Replay review of the out of bounds call pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Nembhard (IND) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds, and possession is correctly awarded to the Knicks. The game clock was re-set to 0:22.4.
Nembhard (IND) initiates contact with Brunson's (NYK) side while he is on the court without affecting his balance. Brunson then jumps to create space to throw the ball off Haliburton (IND).

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Brunson (NYK) jumps and throws the ball off of Haliburton (IND) before going out of bounds. The ball hits Haliburton while he is in the air, and therefore not yet out of bounds. The ball then bounces off of Haliburton and hits Brunson while he is out of bounds. Possession is correctly awarded to the Pacers.

Replay review of the foul called on Turner (IND) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Turner turns into DiVincenzo's (NYK) path and does not give him time and distance to change direction prior to the illegal contact.
Nembhard (IND) wraps Brunson's (NYK) side, affecting his FOM during the inbound.
Nembhard (IND) commits a take foul on Brunson (NYK).
Turner (IND) extends into DiVIncenzo's (NYK) path and delivers contact with his side during the screen.
Haliburton (IND) gathers the pass on his left foot and legally releases his dribble.
Hart (NYK) makes clean contact with the ball and deflects it away as Haliburton (IND) makes the pass.
